vsParam:
Hmm... I see.
So it means that we've come to a different world, right?

Hehehe, this is like what happens in comic books.
I'm kind of excited... Ah! I haven't introduced myself, have I?

My name is Suelle Malen!
I'm a super kawaii alchemist from Merveille!

Everyone calls me Sue.
You can call me "Sue", too!
Oh, you are an alchemist, too?

Uh, yes! And we make unremitting efforts every day
towards building "the kingdom's top-class atelier"!

But... Ha-ha.
We are still far from reaching that goal. Right, Lydie...

Eh, where's Lydie!?
Lydie, where are you!?
Uh... Who's this Lydie you are talking about?

Ah, she's my twin sister.
We run the atelier together...

Hmm... Where did she go...
Sometimes I just can't understand her...

Ha-ha... Hmm, Sue.
If you don't mind, how about staying here with us for now?

You can learn alchemy here.
Chances are that you may run into Lydie here.

Hmm... Let me think... Although I don't want to study,
I have nowhere to go. Staying here seems to be a wise choice...

OK! I'll stay here for now!
Hee hee, nice to meet you!
